clanTagTooltip: Enter a clan tag and the system will try to find the players from your clan. {br} Please make sure you respect the case and keyboard layout when entering the tag
name: Name:
clanMedia: You can also add links to your clan's media (Twitter, Facebook, Instagram etc.):
selectOnlyActivePlayers: Select only the players who will participate in the leagues
addPlayerManually: If any of your players are not on the list, you can add them manually
didNotFindClan: The system did not find a clan with this tag :( {br} If you are sure you entered the tag correctly, {br} please add players manually
performRegisterMessage: Important: ONLY the team manager or an administrator needs to register
noSeasons: There's no season going on right now. You can start a new one by specifying its start time and clicking the button below.
confirm_finish: Are you sure you want to finish the tournament?
tournamentStartMessage: Tournament {number} starts on {date} at {time}. You can apply for participation in it.
tourStartMessage: {time} left until the start of season {season}. Wait for an admin to determine the order of your games
groupStageDistribution: Team groups for the group stage
randomizeMessage: You can randomly assign the teams to {count} {groups} or do it manually by dragging and dropping them.
groupStageCompleteMessage: Looks like you have played all the group stage games. Wait for the grid to be determined.
opponentFinishConfirmationMessage: The opponent pressed the "Finish" button. Clicking the button below will end the match and you will not be able to edit it yourself.
yourFinishConfirmationMessage: You have clicked the "Finish" button. Wait for your opponent or an admin to confirm the end of the match.
teamCompletedStatusDescription: Click on a team name to mark it as the winning team and the tournament as completed.
playerWinnerStatusDescription: Click on a player's name to mark them as the winner of the match.
endGameAndDeclareWinnerDescription: Click on the "Completed" checkbox to end the game and make the team with the most points the winner. {br} If the score is zero, the winner will have to be selected manually.
editMatchModeDescription: Click on the {edit} symbol to enter the match editing mode to be able to change the players and the map name.
deleteMatchDescription: Click on the {delete} symbol to delete the match.
specifyGrid: Specify the number of stages in the grid:
starcraftTrademark: StarCraft II: Legacy of the Void trademark
bitmapOwnership: as well as some of the bitmaps are
registerTeam: Register your team and participate in upcoming tournaments!
noTournaments: There are no tournaments at this time
switchToParticipate: Switch to your account to participate
signinToParticipate: Sign in to your account to participate
gridNotDetermined: The tournament grid has not been determined yet
enterManagerContacts: Enter the contacts of the team manager/s
clickOnPlayer: Click on a player to add them
newPlayerAvatars: New player avatars usually load within 24 hours, but some don't load due to Blizzard API errors
clickOnPlayerToTournament: Click on a player in the list to add them to the tournament roster
clickOnPlayerToRemove: Click on a player in the list below to remove them from the tournament roster
clickOnPlayerToAdd: Click on a player to add them to the tournament roster
setGames: Set the games of the first round of the Playoffs
clickToAddMap: Click to add map to {br} the current season
editMapName: Click to edit {br} the map name
